title: The Archfey

effects: each creature in a 10 ft cube originating from you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed or frightened by you
limits: choose charmed or frightened for each creature
effect lasts until the end of your next turn

effects: become invisible until the start of your next turn
teleport up to 60 ft to an unoccupied space you can see
limits: can be used once per short or long rest

feature_defs.trigger: when a creature attempts to charm you
effects: you are immune to being charmed
if the creature is within 30 ft it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you until the end of your next turn
a creature you can see within 60 ft must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed or frightened
target is incapacitated and speed becomes 0
illusory realm blocks perception of other creatures
limits: repeat saving throw at the end of each of its turns
ends early if target succeeds on save

notes: Archfey patron focuses on charm, fear, and battlefield control.
No additional resources beyond standard warlock Pact Magic.
Feature triggers and limits are intentionally human-readable.
